casebody.data:
Ernest Corriveau et al. v. Aetna Casualty and Surety Company (11866)

Dupont, C. J., Lavery and Spear, Js.

Argued December 9, 1993 decision released January 4, 1994 Alan M. Solomon, with whom, on the brief, were Sandra K. Gerber and Christopher Hynes, legal intern, for the appellants (plaintiffs). Joel J. Rottner, with whom, on the brief, was Barbara B. Sacks, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
